description: Homework:  Watered down sex?  Not on your life, but Bo thinks the soap will help him take Steve's 10 1/2 inches.  He's right, but a little spit helps when they get into the bed - so does a joint.  No stopping once the balling starts and Steve keeps Bo satisfied with the foreceful action of his hard body crashing into his ass.  This is a fast moving, action packed film and will be a great asset to any film collector.  Steve and Bo are here to enjoy themselves - won't you join them?
title: Something Dirty, Scene #02
